page.title: 11A VISIT TO SINFIN SUPERSTORE
page.content: Fine Fare is the name of our local hypermarket,it has a sales area of 39,000 square feet. 13,000-15,000 customers visit a week and they have about 230 lorry deliveries each week. As you walk in the entrance straight infront of you is the clothes department. Behind the clothes department are all the electrical things like computer games and televisions. There is a drinks department that has every drink I could name. At the back of the shop is a big long fridge, it had bacon, sausages and lots of other things in. Our school went into the cheese department. The machine that cut the cheese was sharp, there was also a meat slicer in that room that was 35 years old. Up above is a cafe. We had some orange drink and some bits of pear from the fruit section. By Martyn
